DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness lifestyle program woman Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) . The investigator want assess effect pulse-based diet ( i.e . diet contain lentil , chick-peas , pea , bean ) aerobic exercise improve PCOS disease feature risk factor metabolic syndrome . We would like determine therapeutic effect lifestyle program combine pulse-based diet exercise multiple disease measure PCOS metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Lifestyle Intervention Polycystic Ovary Syndrome : Pulse-Based Diet Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: To date , develop pulse-based meat-based healthy meal follow Therapeutic Lifestyle Changes ( TLC ) guideline recommend NCEP intervention . We recruit enrol participant study set participant complete 4 month intervention . Baseline data also collect participant assessed PCOS . Preliminary measurement POCS characteristic , baseline dietary exercise habit woman PCOS soon available . This study involve intervention compare diet contain pulse ( i.e . bean , pea , chick pea , lentil ) diet recommended National Cholesterol Education Program ( NCEP ) improve marker metabolic syndrome fertility woman poly cystic ovarian syndrome also enrol aerobic exercise program . To date , seven woman pulse-diet group complete intervention , nine woman group receive NCEP diet complete intervention , four woman currently enrol pulse diet two woman currently enrol NCEP diet .
DOC.criteria: Female Diagnosis PCOS Aged 1835 year Taking birth control fertility medication Medical condition limit exercise limit consumption pulsebased diet ( allergy intolerance )
